column1: #Text=" Sokka says : " Well , I just came up with the idea .
#Text=" Mechanist says : " Now do n't sell yourself short , my boy .
#Text=It was your idea to use waterbending to make the subs sink and float , brilliant !
#Text=Though your original designs were a bit difficult to decipher .
#Text=Unfortunately there is one problem I could n't fix .
#Text=The subs have a limited air supply .
#Text=Before we land on the beaches , we 'll need to resurface .
